abstrac: Degreed Certified Administrative Professional with 18+ Years of Experience
bio:
My objective is to obtain challenging projects in my professional environment where my proficiency, skills, strong work ethic and positive attitude can best be utilized.

I am very eager to develop long term relationships between myself and my clients. I feel that my proven track record of organization, attention to details and telecommuting makes me an excellent match for many administrative assignment requirements.  I know I could start delivering results immediately.  

I have mastered many skills through recently earning certificates from both Harvard University in Computer Science in 2013  and MIT in Circuits and Electronics in 2012, along with obtaining my Associate's Degree in Business Administration from Penn State University, and years of experience as an Office Manager, among other executive-level administrative positions.    I also proudly hold designations as a Microsoft Office Specialist, and a Certified Administrative Professional.

My former colleagues and clients will assure you that I am energetic, dependable, organized, resourceful and very pleasant to work with.     

Thank you for considering me. I certainly look forward to hearing from you soon.

Payments-I prefer to use SafePay. I will be pleased to work out an hourly rate or a flat fee for a project. For long- term assignments I generally request payment milestones as facets of the project are completed.

Communication & General Availability-I am available by Phone, Email, Text. I like to communicate voice to voice at least once a week and can use email for the remainder of the time. I am flexible in communication and will meet your schedule to the best of my ability.

Feedback & Endorsement Terms-I understand that from time to time a client may be unsatisfied. I only ask that if you have any concerns, complaints, or negative comments you share them with me first. I cannot fix what I am not aware of and at the end of the day I want you to walk away feeling that you were treated respectfully, honestly, fairly, and your project was completed to the best of my ability.

Guarantee Policy-I write a guarantee into each project description based on the scope of work. I stand by my service and am proud of all the work I complete.

abstrac: IT consultant, 10 years of experience, personalized consulting, specific development, Web technologies excellence
bio:
Based on past experience acquired while working for clients such as McCann, Total, Eurosport, P&G and more I can :

- Design and develop complex business oriented applications
- Organize development teams
- Set up an operational IT system
- Assist in taking technical decisions

My main assignements so far have been :

- Technical expert in web development
- Senior developper in .Net technologies
- Senior developper in PHP technologies (including Wordpress, Joomla, Drupal)
- Senior technical consultant on web application (SEO, Analytics, performances)

After almost 10 years working as developer, then project manager then technical account manager for different requiring clients, I've acquired high level skills.
Those skills will help me leading you to the exact solution and implementation that you need.
I am highly available outside Western European working hours, and I am easy to reach on Skype (id : digit_arts)

bio: Hi My Name is Brenda. I am a published author. My book is a collection of poems. The title of my book is "Tender Moments." I have written several plays that have been put on locally and in nearby towns.  In 2008 I wrote a play called "A Better Man" which involved two original songs, I wrote. I am presently working on my second book, "Simply Me." which is a collection of writing about the women who have influenced my life in their own way. I have been writing for many years. I have come to learn the power of the written word. I am working on two seperate scripts now. If you are looking for an imagintive creative and unique way to say it, I help you do just that. I will be taking my real estated exam i Feb, 2014.
Please contact me via my email address,

abstrac: Specializing in remote IT support and server management
bio:
ABOUT ME - After 20+ years of working in the big cities for mega corporations as a Network Administrator or Systems Engineer, I moved to the country and started offering my expertise to small businesses. 

Most of my services are billed flat-rate, so you pay the same amount every month. My hourly rate is $30/hr. I tell you this ahead of time because my pricing can't compete with people in China, Costa Rica, or India. But those providers can compete with my service and customer satisfaction. Here is some feedback I've received:

"Very reliable IT expert who is a pleasure to work with."

"he supported our Windows infrastructure across multiple offices and proved himself tremendously tremendously valuable to our operations. He solved numerous problems others gave up on. His attitude towards and comprehension of the task at hand was a pleasure to work with."

If you want a professional, that's dedicated to your success, I dare you to compare.

abstrac: Translation - So much more than substituting language A with language B
bio: If you are going to enter the Dutch market, you need a Dutchman with an entrepreneurial mind! There is more to Holland than Tulips and Cheese. When you want a brochure or a web site translated, or even a book: talk to me for a free estimate of what a top notch translation into Dutch would require in terms of investment.

USD 0.17 per source word for translations, USD 0.06 per word for proofreading, USD 60 per hour for all other activities. Payment by escrow in advance, release of escrowed amount within three business days, unless otherwise agreed.

abstrac: experience in Technical Support of Windows and MAC machines, clients and servers, active directory, MCSA 2012 training, infrastructure, antivirus for enterprises local and over the cloud.
bio:
Hi,
I am an IT technical support specialist. I have extensive experience in providing Technical Support for Windows and MAC machines: clients and servers, active directory, exchange, infrastructure, San Storage configuration, google apps for business, office 365, antivirus for enterprises, installation and configuration, operation, and maintenance of hardware, software and networking related infrastructure, smartphone and tablets support, training experience including one-on-one and group training. I have experience in both on premise and cloud support including AWS and Azure experience.  
I have been a team leader managing an infrastructure team of 10 people before I got my immigration visa to Australia. My qualifications and work experience have been assessed and recognized by the Australian Computer Society (ACS), February 2014. Moreover, completed and passed the IELTS (International English Language Testing System), November 2014. I am fluent in both English and Arabic.
Finally, I hold a Skilled Regional (subclass 489) which is valid for four years commencing from September 2015, and in the process of acquiring permanent residency. I am available for any interview immediately.

Mina Tawfik
